title: Role Playing Games
text: Dungeon and Dragons, Pathfinder, and Aliens are only a few of the genre spanning role-playing games sold in the store and played in the community.

title: Magic: The Gathering
text: We have a very active community with events and game nights throughout the week. Friday Night Magic happens every week starting at 6pm

title: Tabletop Gaming
text: Come and join us for Warhammer 40k, Age of Sigmar, or Bolt Action. Organized play through the week and plenty of tables for pick up games anytime.

title: Board Games
text: Our shelves are bursting with stock of the most popular game titles. Axis and Allies, Settlers of Catan, or Gloomhaven we have them all. Stop in today and pick the next hit for game night!

title: Events
text: We always have events going on whether ongoing events like Friday Night Magic or Xwing on Wednsday nights, or our larger tournament style events we have scheduled. All can be seen on our Facebook page join us and check it out!
